Title: The Holy Women at the Tomb
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.592 contains an illustration depicting the holy women at the tomb.
Keywords: Arabic; Binding; Book; Christian; Codex; Colophon; Egypt; Illumination; Illustration; Islamic; Manuscript; Scripture
Provenance: Leon Gruel, Paris [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown] [Henry Walters Ex Libris book plate on the inside of the upper board]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Ilyas Basim Khuri Bazzi Rahib (Egyptian, active ca. 1684)
